author: mike_the_fireman
title: 20th Anniversary Black Chrome Darth Vader Clock
review: Just received this from LEGO, purchased on sale during the May the 4th sales event. Surprised in two ways...first this is a chrome black Darth Vader and very very pleased. A larger replica of the 10th Anniversary rare polybag minifig placed in random sets of the time.  The chrome black is striking and vivid making it stand out. Second surprise was the size. A bit disappointed as the picture on the LEGO Shop website makes it look larger and I was expecting a regular size minifig clock. Not the case in this circumstance.  Approximately 5" tall by 4" wide, this is a small alarm clock. Playability is limited to a button on the top of the black replica brick that also displays the set time. Packaging has the 20th Anniversary print, making it a must for anyone collecting all of the Star Wars Celebration LEGO.
